rules_text:
Mystic Temptress enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{U}{U}, {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mystic Temptress: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.
{3}{U}{U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it for as long as you control Mystic Temptress.
